CustomField.description: This should always be set to False unless you are testing. This will cause the sandbox to send to the configured installed package JCFS.API. Default is disabled. Created 03/21/2025 TCE
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check this to allow the Sandbox to send API messages to the installed JCFS.API package. The JCFS.API package should be connected to a Jira Sandbox. The default for this setting is false. This setting should be disabled when not in use. This setting should be disabled in Production.
CustomField.label: Allow Sandbox to Send
